code: build_adsl(   title = "x.x: Study Subject Data",   subtitle = c("x.x.x: Demographic Characteristics",     "Table x.x.x.x: Demographic Characteristics - Full Analysis Set"),   footer = "Source: ADSL DDMMYYYY hh:mm; Listing x.xx; SDTM package: DDMMYYYY",   split_cols_by = "ARM",   summ_vars = c("AGE", "SEX", "COUNTRY") )

See enableBookmarking() information bookmarking app. uiPattern regular expression applied GET request determine whether ui used handle request. Note entire request path must match regular expression order match considered successful. ... arguments pass golem_opts. See ?golem::get_golem_options details.
